name: The Classroom
description:
A game about a dare, spend the night alone in the classroom, on a stormy night, simple. What could go wrong?


Controls are your standard FPS fare:

Arrows or WASD to move
Mouse to look arround
Mouse button to attack
Secondary mouse to operate the flashlight
Space to jump, jumping is important

This is a Ludum Dare 37 entry. It was created using Unity. The models were done with MagicaVoxel, which is a marvelous program, that allows coders like myself do half decent 3D models.

Enjoy!
